entities.name: rainbow
entities.description: A rainbow arced suddenly across the field, connecting the two balls of light.

entities.name: balls of light
entities.description: The crowd oooo hed and aaaaahed, as though at a fireworks display.

entities.name: shamrock
entities.description: Now the rainbow faded and the balls of light re-united and merged; they had formed a great shimmering sham-rock.

entities.name: golden rain
entities.description: Something like golden rain seemed to be falling from it —

entities.name: leprechauns
entities.description: Squinting up at the shamrock, Harry realized that it was actually comprised of thousands of tiny little bearded men with red vests,

entities.name: ron
entities.description: “Excellent!” yelled Ron as the shamrock soared over them,

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Squinting up at the shamrock, Harry realized that it was actually comprised of thousands of tiny little bearded men with red vests,

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: "Leprechauns!" said Mr. Weasley over the tumultuous applause

relationships.description: A rainbow arced suddenly across the field, connecting the two balls of light.
Now the rainbow faded and the balls of light re-united and merged; they had formed a great shimmering sham-rock.
Squinting up at the shamrock, Harry realized that it was actually comprised of thousands of tiny little bearded men with red vests,
Something like golden rain seemed to be falling from it —
"Excellent!" yelled Ron as the shamrock soared over them,
Squinting up at the shamrock, Harry realized that it was actually comprised of thousands of tiny little bearded men with red vests,
"Leprechauns!" said Mr. Weasley over the tumultuous applause
